about_the_game: The government has put together a special ops task force to infiltrate urban communities & take down the local gangs. However, a plot twist they never saw coming was in store. The gangs have put their differences aside to protect their territory. Which side will you be on? Experience smooth animations & gameplay in this epic multiplayer fps with realistic gunfire, an array of weapons, heart stopping explosions & accurate character models/animations. Grab your friends or experience the multiplayer action solo as you battle it out on 3 different maps including a mall, a train yard & a bank. Compete in 5 different game modes including “Team Deathmatch,” “Free For All,” “Conquest,” “Capture The Flag” & “Hill Confirmed.” Play with up to 32 players in multiplayer or play offline with intelligent lifelike bots programmed to fluidly simulate the movements & actions of human players. In a jam or getting ambushed? Toss a grenade or shoot barrels near enemies to obliterate the opposition with realistic true to life explosion animations to fully immerse you into the action. Play traditionally with keyboard & mouse only to offer precise aiming & in game movement. With a vast array of settings such as video & graphics, controls & audio, you are always in control of your experience & the way you play. Suit up & choose a side! We’ll see you on the battlefield

content_descriptors.notes: Prepare for a typical first-person shooter experience with a focus on player-versus-player (PvP) combat.

detailed_description: The government has put together a special ops task force to infiltrate urban communities & take down the local gangs. However, a plot twist they never saw coming was in store. The gangs have put their differences aside to protect their territory. Which side will you be on? Experience smooth animations & gameplay in this epic multiplayer fps with realistic gunfire, an array of weapons, heart stopping explosions & accurate character models/animations. Grab your friends or experience the multiplayer action solo as you battle it out on 3 different maps including a mall, a train yard & a bank. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Urban Intel: Special Ops

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Intense urban muliplayer FPS built in unreal engine delivering smooth animations & adrenaline filled multiplayer action. The special ops want to take control of urban territory & give it back to the government. The gangs have united to form a front against the threat. Which side will you be on?
